ingredients.ingredient: 20 slices thinly sliced deli roast beef
1 pinch salt and ground black pepper to taste
1 pinch salt and ground black pepper to taste

cookingTips: Keep enoki mushroom bundles intact by wrapping loosely with thin beef slices rather than single strands
Use toothpicks to secure the beef wrapping if needed, removing before serving
Cook on medium heat to gently warm the mushrooms while crisping the beef edges slightly
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Explain how to wrap delicate mushroom bundles with thin beef slices and the importance of gentle cooking to maintain texture.
